alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of southeastern Bladen, western Brunswick, central Columbus and southeastern Horry Counties through 330 PM EST... At 259 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers along a line extending from near Council to near North Myrtle Beach Airport. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle Beach, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Little River, Little River Entrance, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Cherry Grove Inlet, Iredell, Rowan, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Sandyfield, Makatoka, Hallsboro and Exum. This includes the following highways... US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 21. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 9 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 22 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry
